property.name: ipName
property.label: Integration procedure name
property.description: Name of the Integration procedure mapping content to this collection. Leave empty to pass raw card data in inputJSON.

property.name: inputJSON
property.label: Input JSON
property.description: JSON formatted input parameters for the Integration procedure.

property.name: optionsJSON
property.label: Options JSON
property.description: JSON formatted options for the Integration procedure.

property.name: drag
property.label: Dragging enabled
property.description: Enables to drag the cards for previous or next page.

property.name: justifyContent
property.label: Center content
property.description: Centers card horizontally should not all the lateral space be needed.

property.name: displayDate
property.label: Display date
property.description: Use the content publication date as the card date.

property.name: className
property.label: Class name
property.description: Additional CSS class to be applied.
